name: USD Mint
overview:
USD Mint and USD are the global Money Mega-Brands (I own the trademarks).

USD Mint creates and sells Money (USD), and Data on global spending.

USD deliver Top-of-Mind and Wallet for Over 95% of Card Spending with

Cash-in-Bank “Golden Handcuffs” to Attract and Retain Customers / Cards.

Visa’s “digital money” platform has $5T volume and nets 0.0006% for Visa.

USD Free Pass cards start with 100M spending $5T per year, and Nets 5%.

USD Free Pass cards offer Personal Access to Sales, Services, Status.

USD Cards earn 5% for all Retail and 10% for all Travel spending.

USD are Tax-Free “In-Kind Promotional Benefits” per IRS 2002-18.

Merchant Funded Rewards pay 5% Cash from Retail and Travel spending.

Mint Funded Rewards multiply that value to benefit cardholders and Mint.

“Make Money” is USD Mint’s new web service.

Mint Vaults protect Privacy.

Mint Places and Wallet add value.

USD United Service, Sales, Savings, Spending, Social, Status Dollars.
